name: DOCS_RCVD_SURG_HX
description: This table contains surgical history information.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: SURG_HX_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the unique reference identifier associated with the surgical history.

columns.name: SURG_HX_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the free text name for the surgical history procedure.

columns.name: SURG_HX_PROC_ID
columns.description: This item stores the mapped Procedure ID for the surgical history procedure.

columns.name: SURG_HX_START_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the start date of the surgical history.

columns.name: SURG_HX_END_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the end date of the surgical history.

columns.name: SURG_HX_FREE_TXT_DT
columns.description: This item stores the free text date of the surgical history.

columns.name: SRG_HX_LATERALITY_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the laterality of the surgical history.

columns.name: SURG_HX_COMMENT
columns.description: This item stores the comments of the surgical history.

columns.name: SURG_HX_SRC_DXR_CSN
columns.description: This item stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the Document Received record that owns the instance of this surgical history.

columns.name: SURGHX_LST_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last update instant of the surgical history in UTC.

columns.name: SURG_HX_PAT_HX_RESP_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient response for the surgical history question.

columns.name: SURG_HX_QUESTION_ID
columns.description: Stores the surgical history Question ID.

columns.name: SURG_HX_TEMPLATE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the history template associated with the surgical history.

columns.name: SURG_HX_TEMPLATE_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Visit Navigator (VN) History Template Definition (LQH) record.
